Name: Translation at a social worker
VO information: Weekly support for social workers - times depend on volunteers, could pay volunteer money maybe

Name: Child care
Sommerfest Refugium
VO information: Auf-Abbau, Kinderschminken, Getränke/Snacks Ausgabe, Spielangebote, Hüpfburg Betreuung

Name: Support with setting up a clothing bank in Marzahn
VO information:
The volunteer coordinator would like to set up a clothing bank in the refugee accommodation centre. 
They are looking for 5-6 people who can assist with this task.

Name: Play sports with residents of an accommodation centre
Schedule: Flexible, Friday, Monday, Saturday, Sunday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday
Languages needed: Arabic, Dari, English, German, Russian, Turkish, no specific language needed
VO information: Residents of an accommodation centre would like to play football, volleyball, table tennis and other games with volunteers. The schedule is flexible and can be discussed with the volunteer coordinator.

Name: Translate for social workers once a week
Schedule: Flexible, Friday, Monday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday
VO information:
Social workers of a refugee accommodation centre in Pankow need support translating into French and German for new residents. The schedule is flexible and should not take more that 2-3 hours a day once a week or less if you is not available every week.
If you can translate over the phone it would also be a huge help.

Name: Make cotton candy at a Summer Festival
VO information: Support with making cotton candy at a summer festival in a refugee accommodation centre. If you have a couple of hours of free time please let us know!

Name: Help with homework for school students in Neukölln
VO information: It’s a regular volunteering opportunity (once a week). Support is needed for school kids with different subjects. The kids speak German so the volunteer should also be able to speak German.

Name: Support with filling out forms for residents
Schedule: 9-17, Flexible, Friday, Monday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday
Languages needed: Arabic, Dari, Farsi, Georgian, German, Russian, Turkish
VO information:
Support residents of a refugee accommodation centre in Treptow-Köpenick by filling out different forms with them, e.g. Jobcenter, Sozialamt, Familienkasse etc.
The schedule can be arranged individually with the volunteer coordinator.
German skills are required.

Name: Be a part of German language exchange (1 on 1) in Hellersdorf
VO information:
Residents of the refugee accommodation centre want to improve their German and can also teach other people their language. E.g. if someone wants to learn Farsi they can do a language tandem with a resident one on one and help each other. 
The languages of the residents are Farsi, Arabic, Turkish, Russian and French.

Name: Support a clothing bank in Hellersdorf
Languages needed: English, German, no specific language needed
VO information:
There is a clothing bank in the refugee accommodation centre and two of the residents volunteer there. They would like to get some support from other volunteers.
The schedule can be discussed with the volunteer coordinator.
They also need volunteers who can help with looking for donations of winter clothes and collecting them.

Name: Lead a German language café - Help residents with homework in Hellersdorf
VO information:
Some of the residents of the refugee accommodation centre already attend a German course and need support with their homework, grammar, etc. The schedule is flexible and can be changed according to your availability.
It is not a classical language cafe. rather tutoring for adults.

Name: Support a clothing bank in Pankow
Languages needed: English, German, no specific language needed
VO information: They need new volunteers. The schedule can be discussed with the volunteer coordinator.

Name: Support with daycare in Tempelhof
VO information:
Support the daycare staff with organising games and activities for chidlren.
They would be happy to get volunteers who can come regularly and organise creative activities for the kids between 12:30 and 16:30.

Name: Read books for kids in Renickendorf
Schedule: 9-17, Flexible, Friday, Monday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday
VO information:
There is a small library in the refugee accommodation centre with books in different languages. They need volunteers who enjoy reading books for or with the children.
The schedule is flexible and can be discussed individually.

Name: Organise a German language café in Britz
Schedule: 9-17, Flexible, Friday, Monday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday
VO information:
Every resident of the refugee accommodation centre is welcome to join language café. The idea for it is to give the residents a safe space to practice German and learn useful words ans phrases. 
It should be very accessible.
It does not exist there so volunteers should be also able to set it up and run it.

Name: Organise and lead a Männer*café  in Neukölln
Schedule: 9-17, Flexible, Friday, Monday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday
VO information:
Männer*café offers the opportunity to learn from other men* and to support each other. Workshops, discussion groups and joint activities are offered to promote exchange and growth. It is a place where men* can gain new perspectives.
It  would also be great to have a volunteer who can lead the group, explain a bit about Germany and go out to explore Berlin together.

Name: Support women get to know their neighbourhood in Britz and Berlin in general
VO information: Members of a women’s group in the refugee accommodation centre (Frauencafe) would like to go out and learn more about Berlin. Volunteers can take them to museums, walk around the neighbourhood or do other fun things. Museums and galleries sometimes provide free tickets for refugees.

Name: Support the clothing bank in Lichtenberg
Languages needed: Any, English, German, no specific language needed
VO information: The clothing bank needs help and someone who would like to get involved. At the moment they only have one volunteer who helps them. It is open on Wednesdays from 11:00 to 13:00 and the volunteers are welcome stay for around two hours or more.

Name: Support during a summer festival in Lichtenberg
Languages needed: English, German, no specific language needed
VO information: On 24.09 there is a summer party in the refugee accommodation centre. Therefore they are looking for helping hands on that day from 14:00-18:00 for e.g: Setting up and taking down tables/chairs, face painting, bouncy castle, serving drinks and popcorn, tombola, etc.

Name: Support a refugee from Ukraine learn German in Wilmersdorf
VO information: It’s an older Ukrainian man who needs some German practice. He is flexible with time till September and is willing to meet with the volunteer outside of the RAC. It would be best if the volunteer is also older.

Name: Support during a sports festival in Hellersdorf
VO information:
They need volunteers to support the staff during the sports festival. Here is the description of activities:
Stationen: Beachvolleyball; Basketball; Badminton; Tischtennis; Fußball-Dart; Fußballspiel; Hüpfburg; Disc Golf; Balance Challenge / Slackline; Ziel Wurf (Cricket); Karate; Schach; Bike Parkour; Malen?; ... (Grüne sind bereits bestätigt)

Das sind die Veranstaltungen, und jede Station braucht eine oder zwei Personen, die die Karten stempeln (die Teilnehmer könnten ihre Karten stempeln lassen und am Ende einen Preis für ihre Teilnahme bekommen) oder die Namen der Kinder aufschreiben, die teilnehmen möchten, oder die Kinder zu den richtigen Stationen führen, kurz gesagt, am Stand anwesend sein.

Name: Organising and supporting a women’s group
VO information: Hast du gerade eine Person(gerne eine Frau),die Lust hast bei Frauencafé mitzuhelfen? Sowohl Unterstützung bei der Vorbereitung, Durchführung und Nachbereitung. Sie kann gerne ihre Idee einbringen. Eine plus wäre,wenn die Person türkisch, russisch, georgisch oder arabisch zusätzlich kann. Aber das ist kein Muss

Name: Sports and activities for kids and teens in Hellersdorf on the weekend
Languages needed: Arabic, English, German, Persian, Turkish, no specific language needed
VO information: It’s more urgent in Maxie-Wander-Str. and can happen over the weekend.

Name: Support during a summer festival in Zehlendorf
VO information: Volunteers are needed for organising activities for kids, serving food and drinks, help clean up etc.

Name: Support with daycare in Wilmersdorf
VO information:
There are usually 3-7 kids and 1 Kinderbetreuerin. She wished to have some support and someone to bring new ideas into their daycare.
She does not speak English.

Name: Accompany residents to a FreiluftKino in Prenzlauerberg
VO information:
Könnte ich über euch Ehrenamtlichen finden, die Lust hätten einige Bewohner aus der Unterkunft abzuholen und mit denen zur Filmveranstaltung zu kommen? (20 min. zu fuß) Die Veranstaltung ist kostenlos, die Ehrenamtlichen + Bewohner bekommen die Getränke umsonst  

21. August 2024, 20:30 – 22:30 Uhr
28. August 2024, 20:30 – 22:30 Uhr
4. September 2024, 20:15 – 22:15 Uhr
11. September 2024, 20:00 – 22:00 Uhr

Contact person: Hend Reffky Mobil: +49 (0)159 043 61 513 Email: mailto:hend.refky@pfefferwerk.de

Name: Support the residents of an accommodation centre get to know their neighbourhood better in Wilmersdorf
Languages needed: Arabic, Dari, English, Farsi, German, Russian, Turkish
VO information: The idea for this volunteering opportunity is to support the residents of the RAC in going out and finding new things to do in their neighbouthood. It could be done once a month, or once every two weeks. If there are community centres, sport games, or other activities for kids/adults, the volunteers’ task would be to go together with the residents to let them feel accepted and safe.

Name: Assist an Arabic-speaking family finding activities for children in Wilmersdorf
VO information: It’s two sisters with several kids. Both of them are single moms, some of the kids are disabled. They don’t have time to provide activities and things to do for every kid, so they would be happy to have some support with it.

Name: Help with homework for elementary school students in Wilmersdorf
VO information: It’s a regular volunteering opportunity (once a week). Support is needed for elementary school kids with different subjects. The kids speak German so the volunteer should also be able to speak German.

Name: Play with kids and organise activities for the during a summer festival in Wilmersdorf
VO information:
They are looking for volunteers who can organise activities for kids (face painting, games, sports, pop-corn etc.). 

Volunteers can just come by at 1 pm. We don’t need to introduce them before hand.

Contact person: Young-Sun Song

Name: Support with accompanying kids around in the neighborhood in Zehlendorf
VO information: Accompany children around the neighbourhood to different activities, e.g. football etc.

Name: Support with daycare in Zehlendorf
Languages needed: English, German, Russian, Turkish, no specific language needed
VO information: Volunteers are needed to support the childcare staff (organise activities, bring new ideas, support with existing activities like games and arts and crafts)

Name: Help with homework (German and English) in Zehlendorf
VO information: They need volunteers who can support kids with tutoring and helping them with homework (various school subjects including English). The kids speak German and are in different grades. Volunteers should be able to speak German except for English tutoring.

Name: Support an Arabic-speaking family settle in Moabit
VO information: It’s a big family consisting of 7 people who have just moved to Berlin in April 2024. They need help getting around the city, finding things to do etc. The grandmother of the family is disabled and uses a wheelchair.

Name: Help an older Ukrainian woman learn and practice German
VO information: She takes care of her husband and has very little free time to practice German. It would be great to have someone for a German-Russian/German-Ukrainian.

Name: Sorting and giving out donations from Tafel in Pankow
VO information:
Wir suchen noch Leute, die uns bei der  Sortierung  und Ausgabe von den Spenden der Tafel e. V. am Montag und/oder  Freitag  zwischen 14 und 17 Uhr helfen.
Berliner Tafel is organising food donations, more info here https://www.berliner-tafel.de/

Name: Accompany children to external events around Berlin
VO information:
Gleich schon beginnen die Sommerferien. Damit unsere lieben Kinder sich aber nicht langweilen müssen, haben wir ihnen ein buntes Programm mit zahlreichen Aktivitäten und Ausflügen zusammengestellt.
 
Eben für diese Ausflüge benötigen wir noch die ein oder andere erwachsene Begleitperson, damit möglichst viele Kinder daran teilnehmen können (Pro Erwachsenen 5 Kinder).Folgendes ist geplant:
 
• 02.08. – Lobecksportplatz, 10 -13:30 Uhr
• 05.08. – Treptower Park, Insel der Jugend, 14 – 17 Uhr
• 06.08. – Kino: Garfield, Cubix Alexanderplatz, 9:30 – 13 Uhr
• 12.08. – Plantsche, Volkspark Friedrichshain, 10:30 – 16:30 Uhr
• 13.08. – Naturkundemuseum, 9:30 -14 Uhr
• 19.08. – Gleisdreieckpark, 10 – 16:30 Uhr
• 23.08. – Britzer Garten, 9:30 – 13:30 Uhr
• 26.08. – Spielplatz Ritterburg, 14 – 16:30 Uhr
• 28.08. – Holzbauworkshop Kreativhaus Mitte, 10 – 13 Uhr
• 29.08. – Haus der Natur, Wuhlheide, 10 – 17:00 Uhr
 
Es handelt sich größtenteils um Halbtagsausflüge. Treffpunkt ist immer hier bei uns in der Unterkunft. Natürlich müssen die Kinder hierhin auch wieder zurück.
Wer also Zeit und Lust hat (oder jemanden kennt, der Zeit und Lust hat) bei einer oder mehreren Aktivitäten zu unterstützen, melde sich für nähere Informationen bitte bei uns unter mailto:ehrenamt@prisod-wohnend.de.

Contact details of the RAC
mailto:p.dzyuballa@prisod-wohnen.de
mailto:ehrenamt-stallschreiber@prisod-wohnen.de
mailto:stallschreiber-kb@prisod-wohnen.de

Name: Support with daycare during summer break in Hellersdorf
Languages needed: Arabic, English, German, Persian, Russian, no specific language needed
VO information:
Bis Ende August 
Kinder (Altersgruppe 5 - 14 Jahre)
Aktivitäten wie Malen, Spielen, Lesen usw. zu betreuen.
Die Freiwilligen müssen nicht regelmäßig kommen. Einmal oder zweimal pro Woche ist auch sehr hilfreich.

Name: Support during a summer festival
VO information:
Es wäre großartig, wenn wir Freiwillige hätten, etwa für die folgenden Aktivitäten:
 
- Theater/Zauberer
- Tänzer/Sänger
- Catering Helfer
- Reinigung
- Popcorn/Süßemaschine
- Gesichter Malen
- Spiele für Kinder und Erwachsene

Name: Support repair bikes with the residents of an accommodation centre in Zehlendorf
VO information: Freiwillige fpr die Mitarbeit in der Fahrradselbsthilfewerkstatt (Tatsächlich auch als Honorarkraft auf selbstständiger Basis möglich)

Name: Face Painting for kids for a Summer Festival
VO information: Wir suchen also vor allem nach Menschen, die Lust darauf haben, etwas mit Kindern zu machen oder mit Eltern und Kindern. Ganz konkret suchen wir aktuell nach einer Person, die bei unserem Sommerfest am 12.07. Kinderschminken anbietet.

Name: Organise activities for a Männer*cafe in Pankow
VO information: Volunteers are needed for a Männer Cafe (two hours for the men living in the RAC to meet and talk about things interesting to them)

Name: Organise activites for teenagers in Pankow
VO information: Volunteers are needed for a so-called Jungstreff where teenagers meet and do fun things together. We don’t have any specific information about this activity.

Name: Group of volunteers to help the Volunteer Coordinators of Hangars
VO information: coordinator contacted all volunteers

Name: Helping with homework in Neukölln
VO information: Volunteers are needed to help school kids with their homework. The kids speak German.

Name: German language exchange in Neukölln
VO information: Residents of the RAC would like to improve their German language skills and share more about their own language and culture with everyone who is interested.

Name: Support a German language café in Neukölln
VO information: This language cafe has been running for more than a year now. It has a core group of participants who mostly speak Arabic, but every resident of the RAC is welcome to join it.

Name: Organise games and fun activities in a playroom in Neukölln
Languages needed: English, German, Russian, Turkish, no specific language needed
VO information:
Languages are not a must, however most of the team speaks German.
Playroom is a project that has been running for more than a year already. There is a group of volunteers organising activities for kids on Mon and Wed evening. As there is no full-time daycare in the RAC, the more volunteers there are the more daycare activities can be organised.

Name: Support with daycare in Reinickendorf
Schedule: 9-17, Flexible, Friday, Monday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday
Languages needed: Arabic, Dari, English, Farsi, French, German, Turkish, no specific language needed
VO information:
They need a volunteer to organise activities for children and support the daycare workers in the RAC. As it is an initial reception centre, some of the kids are not attending school yet, so the help might also be needed in the morning.
The volunteer would be able to bring their own ideas and implement them.

Name: Help with daycare in Lichtenberg
Languages needed: Arabic, English, Georgian, German, Persian, Russian, no specific language needed
VO information:
Volunteers are needed to support the daycare workers after kids come to school. The tasks include playing with kids etc.

Wir benötigen grundsätzlich Unterstützung Mo, Mi und Do jeweils im Zeitraum 15:00 -18:00 Uhr.Mittwoch und Donnerstag jeweils als Unterstützung unserer eigenen Kinderbetreuung.

Name: Organise daycare in a refugee accommodation centre in Lichtenberg
Languages needed: Arabic, English, German, Persian, Russian, no specific language needed
VO information:
They don’t have their own daycare on Mondays, so they need at least 2 volunteers on site at the same time.

Montag haben wir leider keine eigene Betreuung und bräuchten da eigentlich sehr dringend Hilfe. Das ließe sich aber wegen des 4 AugenPrinzips nur lösen wenn wir über Euch gleich 2 Ehrenamtliche bekämen die zeitgleich könnten.Sprachlich wäre Deutsch als Basis vor allem für die Hausaufgabenbetreuung wichtig. Ansonsten haben wir Kinder, die arabisch, farsi, russisch georgisch etc sprechen- da wäre alles natürlich hilfreich aber nicht Voraussetzung.

Name: Accompanying a family from Afghanistan to doctor’s appointments around Berlin
VO information:
Die 17-jährige Tochter der Familie ist 3x wöchentlich auf Dialyse in der Charité angewiesen. In diesem Zusammenhang bedarf es nach Angabe von Herrn Taimuri wohl demnächst eines Dolmetschers der Farsi spricht, da ein Gespräch mit dem Arzt, zur Weiterbehandlung von Nöten ist. Herr Taimuri würde sich sehr über ihre Hilfe freuen und bittet um Kontaktaufnahme unter der Nummer : 0176/23234363.
 
Contact of the social worker:
Miriam Luchterhandt,  0151 657 140 10
mailto:Miriam.luchterhandt@paragraf1.de

Name: Support with daycare in Lichtenberg
Languages needed: Arabic, English, German, Persian, no specific language needed
VO information: They need volunteers to support the daycare workers in the morning and bring new creative ideas into the existing routine.

Name: Organise sport activities for children in Marienfelde
Languages needed: English, German, Russian, no specific language needed
VO information: Would be ideal if the volunteer speaks German, since they want the kids to learn. All the team speaks Russian

Name: Support with activities for a men group in Neukölln
VO information: There is already one volunteer who speaks Farsi and he needs support. Now Zaki e.V. is responsible for this group and having one more person would definitely help them.

Name: Supporting with daycare on the weekend in Pankow
VO information: Started on April, 6th. 2024

Name: Teach a couple from Afghanistan how to read and write in German in Moabit
VO information: They are older and need to learn how to read and write in German before they can start attending a German course

Name: Play table tennis with residents of a refugee accommodation centre in Treptow-Köpenick
Languages needed: Arabic, English, German, Russian, no specific language needed
VO information: There is table tennis in the yard. They need a volunteer to come by and play with the residents. Times can be flexible and discussed with the RAC staff.

Name: Support with homework in Lichtenberg
VO information: The kids speak German, we don’t know anything about their ages or grades. They would need help with various subjects.

Name: Organise activities for women in Neukölln
VO information: A volunteer, preferably a woman, is needed to organise fun activities for women in the RAC. It can include going out or doing something that interests the residents in the RAC.

Name: Organise arts and crafts classes for kids and teens in Neukölln
VO information: Volunteers are needed for organising arts and crafts activities for children, e.g. drawling, painting, moulding, origami etc.

Name: Organise activities for kids in Lichtenberg
Schedule: 9-17, Flexible, Friday, Monday, Thursday, Tuesday, Wednesday
Languages needed: Arabic, German, Persian, Russian, Turkish, no specific language needed
VO information: They need a volunteer to help organise activities for kids and support the daycare workers. Times can be discussed with the volunteer. Most of the kids go to school, so most of daycare usually happens 14-17.

Name: Lead a German language cafe in Wedding
VO information: They need volunteers for Schlasch, a project for Club DIalog. There is a German language cafe for Russian and Ukrainian speaking teenagers once a week where thy can practice their German in a fun way.

Name: Support a German language support for women in Hellersdorf
VO information:
There is a group of women in the RAC that would love to have someone to practice their German with.
The volunteer should preferably be a woman.

Name: Organise activities for daycare in Lichtenberg
Languages needed: Arabic, German, Persian, no specific language needed
VO information: They don’t have daycare other than on Thursdays. There is one daycare worker that needs support as there are quite a lot of kids.

Name: Be a part of Hürdenspringer in Tempelhof-Schöneberg
VO information: It’s a long-term programme that requires some serious evolvement of a volunteer

Name: Arts and crafts for children and their families in Tempelhof
VO information: There is already one volunteer active, she needs support. Arts and crafts can be various depending on what the volunteer can do (drawing, moulding, sculpting etc.)

Name: Organise fun activities for kids and teens in Marzahn - IB
Languages needed: Arabic, English, Georgian, German, Persian, Turkish
VO information: Anything volunteers can do as their own activities. preferably with kids teens is welcome mainly until 18.00 but after some familiarity also during after work hours. Additionally sometimes soft accompanying to the LEA or court as

Name: Accompany kids during KinderKulturMonat in October in Berlin
Languages needed: Arabic, English, German, Persian, Russian, Ukrainian, no specific language needed
VO information:
Der Kinder·Kultur·Monat ist ein Festival für Kinder und Ihre Familien in Berlin.
Mit Kunst, Musik. Tanz. Kino. Besuchen im Museum. Und vielen anderen Sachen.
Das Festival ist jedes Jahr im Oktober.
An jedem Wochen·ende im Oktober
gibt es spannende Sachen zum Mitmachen und Ausprobieren.
In allen Bezirken in Berlin öffnen Häuser für Kunst und Kultur Ihre Türen.
Zum Beispiel:
Theater und Museen KinosKunst·schulen, Musik·schulen und Tanz·schulenKunst·galerien, Ausstellungenund viele andere Häuser
Alle freuen sich auf Euch!

Name: Sewing or Knitting with Women in Treptow-Köpenick
Languages needed: Arabic, English, German, Persian, Russian, no specific language needed
VO information: There are sewing machines and materials for knitting in the accommodation centre. They are looking for a volunteer who could knit/sew with the women twice a month.

Name: Support a Turkish-speaking kid with learning German in Treptow-Köpenick
VO information:
No Turkish is fine, the volunteers will have to have the two meetings with the kid with the VC and the kid’s mom present (Tuesday/Wednesday/Thursday).
This kid goes to school but has difficulty catching up with everyone else, so it would be great if there was someone to support them.

Name: Support with gardening (Vegetable Garden) in Treptow-Köpenick
Languages needed: English, German, no specific language needed
VO information:
There is a small vegetable garden in the yard, and the staff would be happy to have some support with it from a volunteer who knows how to garden.
The gardening season would be over around mid-October.

Name: Support with daycare in Mitte
Languages needed: English, German, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, no specific language needed
VO information: It would be best if volunteers could volunteer for 2-3 hours at a time. It would be great if they could come regularly.

Name: Sports
Support during a Summer Festival
VO information: Volunteers are needed for serving food and drinks, organising activities for children and teenagers

Name: Doctor’s Appointment: Kid
VO information:
Termine der Kinder von Frau Stoian/Butucel.
Ismail Butucel hat einen Termin am 17.06.24 um 10:40 Uhr
Bei Dr. med. Margrit Lock, Klosterstraße 34, 13581 Berlin.

Name: Doctor’s Appointment: Kid
VO information:
Arian Stoian hatte den folgenden Termin:
Dienstag, 20. August 2024 um 09:00 Uhr
Ort: Hautklinik, Charité Campus Mitte, Luisenstr. 2-5, 10117 Berlin
Arian is a son of Frau Stojan, they speak Russian and Romanian

Name: Sorting Papers for Residents
VO information: wir wollen hier im Hagenower Ring am 01.07. 15-18 Uhr ein Event machen,bei welchem wir Bewohner*innen dabei helfen ihre Unterlagen/Dokumente zusortieren und abzuheften.

Name: Action day asked for by Aprilsix volunteers
VO information:
Freiwilligenarbeit für ein Team von LucaNet (30 Personen) in Berlin für Montag, den 24.06., am Nachmittag (ab circa 14:00 Uhr).
Können wir euch mit kleinen Teams aus 2-5 Personen bei bestimmten Aktionen unterstützen?

Name: Garden volunteering day in mitte
VO information:
Zelando team asked for one day volunteering- connected to Assiel Hamdan
Stv. Einrichtungsleitung
AE / GU Invalidenstr. 31-33 
The Team of the RAC wants some construction for gardening . We gove sone cash for materials they asked for it.

Name: Multi Translation Buchholtz
VO information:
Wohnungssuche

In Zusammenarbeit mit dem SozialTeam Bieten wir eine kleines Seminar an über das Wohnungssuche in Berlin an.
Folgende Fragen wird beantwortet:
- Was ist WBS und wer hat Anspruch?
- wie findet man eine Wohnung überhaupt?
- Was ist zu beachten?

Datum: 13.06.2024
Zeit:

14:30 - Arabisch
16:00 - Türkisch
Ort: Buchholzer Str 110-140 13159 Berlin

Name: vietnamesisches Greifswalderstr
VO information: vietnamesisches Dolmetschen. Sie hat einen Termin am 12.06.2024 um 9:30 Uhr in der MVZ-Caritas in Greifswalder Str.139 Berlin.

Name: Russian German Jobcenter
VO information: Weg. Ich hätte eine Anfrage für den 13.06 um 9:00 Uhr bei der Agentur für Arbeit Süd, Sonnenallee 282, 12057 Berlin, für Hr. Yakymenchuk (Bewohner unserer Unterkuft). Ich würde mich auf eine baldige und hoffentlich positive Rückmeldung!

Name: Operation doctors translation persian
VO information:
Bewohner aus Afghanistan, der Dari spricht, für zwei Termine.
 
Er benötigt eine Begleitung zu folgendem OP-Termin im Krankenhaus:
 
Name: Saifur Rahman Amini
Datum: Donnerstag, 27.06.24 um 8:00 Uhr   (Dauer unbekannt!)
Adresse: Unfallkrankenhaus Berlin, Klinik für Urologie, Warener Straße 7, 12683 Berlin
Treffpunkt: 8:00 Uhr Zentrale Patientenaufnahme, danach Abteilung H1 Urologie
 
Die OP kann ohne Übersetzer nicht stattfinden und der Übersetzer wird bestimmt länger vor Ort sein müssen.
 
Saifur geht nächste Woche zu seinem Urologen, um sich die Überweisung abzuholen. Er möchte dort noch einige Fragen mit dem Arzt klären und fragt, ob jemand telefonisch übersetzen könnte. Er kann dort ohne Termin hingehen. Also wenn du mir einen Zeitrahmen von zwei Stunden geben kannst, zwischen Montag und Donnerstag, wo ein Übersetzer verfügbar wäre, dann kann er sich danach richten.

Name: Doctors appointments
VO information:
Liluma Karimi
Treffpunkt: Maxie-Wander-Straße 78, 12619 Berlin, Security
Zeit: 10.06.2024, 12:15 Uhr
Ziel: Albert-Einstein-Straße 2, Berlin-Adlershof, Ärztehaus, Zahnarztpraxis Dr. Cramm (Termin 14:00 Uhr)
Vorschlag: U5 bis Wuhletal, dann S5 bis Ostkreuz, dann S85 bis Adlershof, Rest: Fußweg
In der Praxis erfolgt nur eine Begutachtung der Zähne und des Behandlungsplans. Kein langer Aufenthalt oder Wartezeit. Bitte auch Begleitung zurück zur Unterkunft bzw. Absprache mit Frau Karimi.
Telefonnummer: 213 099 114 (Sozialbüro).   03.07/ 8:00 – 12:00 Uhr Oranienburger Str. 85, 13437 Berlin

Name: Voruntersuchung für die OP
VO information: ich benötige für eine Bewohnerin Aghunik Yeganyan von uns am 03.06.2024 eine Sprachmittlung in der Sprache Russisch. Der Termin ist in der Charité im Brustzentrum(Luisenstraße 65, 10117 Berlin). Die Bewohnerin wird an dem Tag operiert, vermutlich beginnt der Termin um 7:00 oder 8:00 Uhr morgens und wird gehen, bis unsere Bewohnerin in den OP gebracht wird. Genauere Zeiten erfahre ich am Freitag, da an diesem Tag die Voruntersuchungen für die Operation stattfinden.
